div.span: To avoid accidentally filtering our email blasts, Please add @honeywell.com to your contacts.

h4.strong: Keep Up To Date On All Chesterfield School Events

div.span: Due to the COVID-19 epidemic and Governor Murphy's Executive Order #107, the Chesterfield Township School District's building will remain closed to students until further notice. Governor Murphy's Executive Order #107 reads, "All public, private, and parochial preschool program premises, and elementary and secondary schools, including charter and renaissance schools, shall remain closed to students as long as this Order remains in effect." The district will continue to operate our remote learning platform for all students as long as the Order remains in effect. As of now, we have no indication from the Governor's Office as to when schools in New Jersey will reopen.

strong.a: Click Here for Weekly Remote Learning Plans
Visit Our Counselor's Page for Many Resources to Help Navigate Through This Challenging Time
Visit Our Health Office Page for Information About COVID-19
